announcement.title: Actively Seeking PFE Internship
announcement.details: Available from February 2025 • 4-6 months • Open to full-time conversion

hero.name: Yassir Aitali
hero.title: VR Developer & Computer Science Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: Full-stack web development and VR technologies specialist based in Morocco

about.title: About Me
about.description: Motivated Full Stack Engineer & VR Developer with a solid foundation in DevOps, Software Architecture, and Cloud development.
about.objective:
I am proficient in the complete Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), focusing on developing scalable applications and implementing automated CI/CD pipelines and containerization. My technical expertise spans a wide range of languages including Java, Python, and JavaScript, and frameworks such as React, Spring Boot, and Node.js.

Furthermore, I have specialized experience in VR/XR development, leveraging skills in Unity, WebGL, and Blender to create immersive 3D environments and interactive web applications, as demonstrated by my work on VR tours and body tracking systems.

I am eager to apply my knowledge in AI/ML and Big Data to deliver technically excellent, user-focused solutions that emphasize performance and an optimal user experience.

positions.description: Development of immersive VR experiences and 3D web applications for real estate visualization.
achievements: Developed VR tours for property showcasing
Created interactive 3D buildings and architectural visualizations
Built 3D web applications for enhanced client experience

positions.description: Specialized in Unity WebGL development with real-time body tracking technology.
achievements: Developed Unity WebGL body tracking application
Implemented WebSocket streaming for real-time data transfer

positions.description: Full-stack web development with focus on quality assurance and optimization.

items.title: KEY ONE – Real Estate VR Platform
items.description: Comprehensive real estate visualization platform featuring immersive VR property tours, interactive 3D building exploration, and location mapping. Built with Next.js and Three.js for seamless web-based VR experiences, showcasing apartments with 360° panoramas, floor plans, and nearby landmarks integration.

items.title: WebGL Body Tracking System
items.description: Real-time body tracking application developed with Unity and deployed as WebGL. Features advanced pose detection, WebSocket integration for live data streaming, and optimized performance for web browsers. Built during internship at UM6P Vanguard Center for interactive fitness and motion capture applications.

items.title: OPTIPARK – Smart Parking System
items.description: Intelligent parking management system using computer vision and OpenCV for real-time parking space detection. Features automated space monitoring, occupancy tracking, and WebSocket integration for live updates. Developed with Python for efficient video processing and parking optimization.

items.title: Hotel Management System (C#)
items.description: Desktop hotel management application built with C# and .NET, featuring comprehensive booking management, guest registration, room allocation, and billing systems. Designed for efficient hotel operations with intuitive user interface.

items.title: HMS – Hotel Management (Qt/C++)
items.description: Cross-platform hotel management system developed with Qt and C++. Features advanced room management, guest services, billing operations, and reporting functionality. Includes comprehensive database integration and modern UI design.

items.title: Gestion Salles – Room Booking System
items.description: Web-based room and facility booking management system built with Laravel framework. Features user authentication, booking calendar, availability tracking, and administrative controls for managing multiple rooms and schedules.
